text: Adriana Barraza Gonz√°lez (born 5 March 1956)FACTBOX-Facts on best-supporting-actress nominees | U.S. | Reuters is a Mexican actress, acting teacher, and director. She is known for her role in Amores perros and in Babel, which earned her an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress nomination. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican educators Category:Mexican movie directors
